title: Neuro-Nutrition
content:
Neuro-nutrition and utilizing the fundamental cellular functions to advance healing from serious illnesses Dr. <!--more--> Yann Rougier is a medical doctor in France who has devoted over 30 years practicing medicine while researching the intersection of mind, body, nutrition, and the immune system, particularly as it applies to cancer and other degenerative diseases.
He is a founding member of the Institute for Applied Neuronutrition and Neurosciences in Paris France.
Dr Rougier has created a basic program known as Delta Medicine for patients to practice, alongside either conventional or natural alternative therapies, that is based upon the fundamental cellular functions in our bodies: breathing, nutrition, waste elimination, communication with other cells and creation and expression.
He is the author of “Delta Medicine: Natural Therapies for the Five Functions of Cellular Health” for treating cancer and other degenerative diseases.
He visiting our studios now on his trip to the US.
